text:
Want to save on Ugly Christmas Sweaters for next Christmas? Hop on over to Amazon where they are offering up big discounts on Blizzard Bay Ugly Christmas Sweaters …
Here are a few of the deals I spotted… Blizzard Bay Men’s King Neptune Santa Ugly Christmas Sweater 
Starting at only $3.89 (regularly $59.99)
Blizzard Bay Men’s Battle Ropes Santa Ugly Christmas Sweater 
Starting at only $3.89 (regularly $59.99)
Blizzard Bay Men’s Forever Alone Santa Ugly Christmas Sweater 
Starting at only $4.69 (regularly $59.99)

Blizzard Bay Men’s Suave Santa Ugly Christmas Sweater 
Starting at only $4.89 (regularly $60)
Blizzard Bay Men’s Working Elves Ugly Christmas Sweater with Beer Pocket 
Starting at only $4.92 (regularly $59.99)
Please note that Add-on items will ship with a qualifying $25+ order and are eligible for free shipping on $25 orders with Prime OR will ship FREE on $49 orders without Prime . To get your total up to $25, check out all the Amazon deals I’ve posted recently here .
Even MORE Ugly Christmas Sweaters This Way (Thanks, Lisa!)
